assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The proband and her family were enrolled into the Gene Discovery Core at The Manton Center for Orphan Disease Research approved by the IRB (10-02-0053) at Boston Children’s Hospital. Written informed consents were obtained from the patient and family members.
